statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeAttrition WHERE employee_id = 123 AND performance_score > 8.0;
DELETE FROM EmployeeAttrition WHERE employee_id = 456 AND engagement_score < 5.0;
DELETE FROM EmployeeAttrition WHERE performance_score < 6.0 OR engagement_score < 4.0;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND performance_score > 80;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 70 AND engagement_score < 60;
DELETE FROM AttritionData WHERE department = 'Sales' AND years_in_company > 5;
DELETE FROM PredictionResults WHERE prediction_result = 'High Risk';
DELETE FROM attrition_history WHERE employee_id = 1002 AND attrition_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE performance_rating < 3 AND engagement_score < 50;
